bibl.bibl: Krefft, Gerard. 1872. [Review of A Cuvierian principle in palæontology, tested by evidences of an extinct leonine marsupial (Thylacoleo carnifex), by Professor Owen [i.e. Owen 1870].] From the Sydney Mail, 18 May 1872, with corrections. Annals and Magazine of Natural History 4th ser. 10: 169–82.
